data.eml:eml: A revision of the New Zealand weevil genus Irenimus Pascoe, 1876 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brown, Samuel D. J. (2017): A revision of the New Zealand weevil genus Irenimus Pascoe, 1876 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae). Zootaxa 4263 (1): 1-42, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.1.1
